alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 6:12PM CDT until April 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 611 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Holly, or 15 miles west of El Dorado, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Smackover, Norphlet, Strong, Calion, Lisbon, Mount Holly, Urbana, Lawson, Wesson, Newell, New London, Pigeon Hill, Marysville, Cairo, Hillsboro, Three Creeks, Kenova and Catesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
